entries.npc_1_1: You must help me! My husband was telling our kids about the caves filled with Borgles, and it seems they went off to go see the caves firsthand. I'm afraid the worst has happened to them!
entries.npc_2_1: Oh, thank you! Here is where the caves are. If you see them there, let them know that if they don't come home soon, they'll miss dinner.
entries.npc_3_1: I wish my kids had the same common sense as you!
entries.npc_4_1: I tried doing that already. He told me that the kids have to learn the hard way. Needless to say, I've kicked him out until my kids get home safely. Will you please help?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Oh, thank you! Here is where the caves are. If you see them there, let them know that if they don't come home soon, they'll miss dinner.
entries.npc_reset: I wish my kids had the same common sense as you!
entries.npc_work_1: Did you find the borgle bats cave?
entries.player_3_1: Why don't you get your husband to find them?
entries.player_sorry: Not yet. I am still looking.
entries.waypoint_description_1: A natural home to the most successful predators on Rori, the Borgle Bat Caves can be quite dangerous.
